title: Mutual Non-Disclosure Agreement

obligations.description: Maintain strict confidentiality, protect information with reasonable security measures
obligations.penalty_for_breach: Breach causes irreparable harm for which monetary damages are inadequate

obligations.description: Limit disclosure to employees/contractors with need-to-know on confidential basis
Use information only for stated evaluation purposes
Not reverse-engineer or attempt to derive underlying principles

special_terms: Confidentiality Period: 3 years from disclosure date
Trade Secrets: Protected for as long as they remain trade secrets under applicable law
Receiving Party may disclose if required by law/court order with prior written notice
